original_text: As for those who persist in sin, rebuke them in the presence of all, so that the rest may stand in fear.
korean_text: 범죄한 자들을 모든 사람 앞에서 꾸짖어 나머지 사람들로 두려워하게 하라

sentences.original_text: As for those who persist in sin,
rebuke them in the presence of all,
so that the rest may stand in fear.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 나머지 사람들로 두려워하게 하려 함이라.
